headline: Salesforce AI Push With Cimulate Faces Valuation Question And Culture Risks
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) has agreed to acquire AI startup Cimulate to support its AI powered commerce efforts. More than 1,400 employees have signed a letter urging the company to end contracts with U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement. The developments come alongside nearly 1,000 recent job cuts and a wide ranging leadership reshuffle. For you as an investor watching NYSE:CRM, this mix of product expansion and internal pushback arrives at a time when large software providers are racing to...
